Amanda said: David Hasselhoff has settled into the job really well, the only thing he keeps doing is trying to entertain the audience all the time! " Simon Cowell is so busy doing The X Factor in America, so we're lucky to get him back for the live shows. It's brilliant- it's like the king's away and all his little courtiers are all playing- we've been quite naughty! Amanda looked the picture of glamour as she arrived at the Opera House, with a Marilyn Monroe-esque hairdo and wearing a white cape-style coat hiding her baby bump. executive chairman, Eric Schmidt revealed in a post today on Google's blog. More businessperfectly," Eric Schmidt said. "As Google has grown, managing the business has become more complicated," Eric Schmidt wrote. So Larry, Sergey and I have been talking for a long time how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making-- and over the holidays we decided now was the right moment to make some changes to the way we are structured. The news came just before Google announced earnings for its most recent quarter. At$ 8.44 billion, Google's fourth-quarter revenue jumped 26 percent from a year earlier. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come, he said in the statement. engagement at Chelsea Place in Manhattan. She hired a then-unknown piano player for that engagement; a young man fresh from New Orleans named Harry Connick, Ray Charles , who later introduced her at a David Letterman Christmas party as one of the world's finest jazz singers. That four-week engagement lasted for three years for Cynthia Scott , and she decided to stay in New York. Since then, she has headlined at Birdland, Iridium, Dizzy's Club Coca Cola and many more.
